SELECT #{businessCode} || '-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD( COALESCE( (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ord_code, -3))) + 1 FROM ord_list WHERE business_code = #{businessCode}), 1 ), 3, '0' ) AS ordCode FROM dual
INSERT INTO ord_list(ord_code, business_code, ord_date, ord_manager, ord_state, ord_note) VALUES(#{ordCode}, #{businessCode}, #{ordDate}, #{ordManager}, #{ordState}, #{ordNote})
INSERT INTO ord_d_list(ord_d_code, prod_code, ord_code, ord_count, dlvy_date, ttl_price) VALUES(#{ordDCode}, #{prodCode}, #{ordCode}, #{ordCount}, #{dlvyDate}, #{ttlPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT ord.*, ord_d.* FROM ord_list ord LEFT JOIN ord_d_list ord_d ON ord.ord_code = ord_d.ord_code WHERE ord.ord_code = #{ordCode}

SELECT ord.ord_code, ord.ord_state, business.business_name AS business_code, ord.ord_date, ord.ord_manager, SUM(ord_d.ttl_price) AS total_ttl_price, ord.ord_note FROM ord_list ord LEFT JOIN ord_d_list ord_d ON ord.ord_code = ord_d.ord_code LEFT JOIN business business ON ord.business_code = business.business_code GROUP BY ord.ord_code, ord.ord_state, business.business_name, ord.ord_date, ord.ord_manager, ord.ord_note ORDER BY ord.ord_date DESC, ord.ord_code DESC
SELECT od.*, p.prod_name, p.prod_unit, p.prod_price FROM ord_d_list od JOIN product p ON od.prod_code = p.prod_code WHERE od.ord_code = #{ordCode}
SELECT business_code, business_name, business_manager, business_manager_phone FROM business WHERE business_type = 1
SELECT prod_code, prod_name, prod_unit, prod_price FROM product
